chat_history.content:
You are a senior front-end engineer and UI/UX designer.

Create a modern, enterprise-grade SaaS landing page for AI VIDEO GENERATION SAAS CALLED AS VIDEOSHARK using:

Pure HTML5

Modern CSS3 (Flexbox/Grid, variables, gradients)

Vanilla JavaScript (no frameworks)

The page must be:

Professional

Production-ready

Fully responsive

Accessible

Optimized for SaaS startups

üé® DESIGN REQUIREMENTS

Theme: Greenish + Whitish

Primary colors: emerald green, mint green, soft white, light gray

Clean SaaS UI (similar to Stripe, Vercel, Linear)

Smooth micro-animations

Subtle hover effects

Scroll animations (fade-in, slide-up)

Soft shadows & rounded corners

Glassmorphism or soft gradients where appropriate

Modern typography (Inter / system-ui fallback)

üß© PAGE STRUCTURE (SECTIONS)

Build ALL sections listed below with real copy, icons, and layout.

1. Hero Section

Badge: ‚ÄúüöÄ Enterprise-Ready SaaS Platform‚Äù

Headline:
Deploy Your Solution in Minutes

Subtext:
A complete subscription management platform with authentication, billing, and admin tools built for scale.

CTA Buttons:

‚ÄúGet Started‚Äù

‚ÄúView Demo‚Äù

Subtle animated background or gradient

Deploy in 3 Simple Steps

Get your AI video generation platform running in under 5 minutes

1

Clone the Repository

Get the VideoShark codebase from GitHub

git clone https://github.com/videoshark/platform.git
2

Configure Environment

Set up your API keys and database connection

cp .env.example .env
npm install
npm run setup
3

Launch Your Platform

Start the development server or deploy to production

npm run dev

Everything You Need to Scale Fast

Enterprise-grade features built for modern video generation platforms

üé¨

AI-Powered Video Generation

Transform text prompts into stunning videos using state-of-the-art AI models. Support for multiple styles, resolutions, and formats.

Processing Speed
30 sec avg
‚ö°

Lightning Fast Rendering

Distributed rendering across 200+ edge locations. Generate 4K videos in seconds with our optimized pipeline.

Performance 98%
üîê

Enterprise Security

SOC 2 compliant with end-to-end encryption, SSO, and role-based access control.

üìä

Advanced Analytics

Real-time insights into video performance, user engagement, and platform metrics.

üé®

Customizable Templates

Choose from 500+ professional templates or create your own. Full brand customization with your colors, fonts, and logos.

üîÑ

API-First Platform

RESTful API with comprehensive documentation. Integrate video generation into any workflow.

üí≥

Flexible Billing

Integrated subscription management with Lemon Squeezy. Multiple pricing tiers and usage-based billing.

üåç

Global CDN

Deliver videos instantly worldwide with our edge network. 99.99% uptime guarantee.

Ready to Get Started?
